entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
